body: Ok, I don't like how in how many places this is appearing. This also looks like it is because PropagateInputShapes does not work with number types. I think the right fix is to add handling to PropagateInputShapes for the operators that you added. This can be done in a follow up PR, since we are blocked on other things waiting for number type.
